verses.t: Now{G1161} a certain{G5100} man was{G2258} sick{G770}, named Lazarus{G2976}, of{G575} Bethany{G963}, the town{G3588} of Mary{G3137} and{G2532} her{G846} sister{G3588} Martha{G3136}.

(It was{G2258} that Mary{G3137} which{G3588} anointed{G218} the Lord{G3588} with ointment{G3464}, and{G2532} wiped{G1591} his{G846} feet{G3588} with{G3588} her{G846} hair{G2359}, whose{G3739} brother{G3588} Lazarus{G2976} was sick{G770}.)
Therefore{G3767} his sisters{G3588} sent{G649} unto{G4314} him{G846}, saying{G3004}, Lord{G2962}, behold{G1492}, he whom{G3739} thou lovest{G5368} is sick{G770}.

When{G1161} Jesus{G3588} heard{G191} that, he said{G2036}, This{G3778} sickness{G3588} is{G2076} not{G3756} unto{G4314} death{G2288}, but{G235} for{G5228} the glory{G3588} of God{G3588}, that{G2443} the Son{G3588} of God{G3588} might be glorified{G1392} thereby{G1223}.
Now{G1161} Jesus{G3588} loved{G25} Martha{G3588}, and{G2532} her{G846} sister{G3588}, and{G2532} Lazarus{G3588}.
When{G5613} he had heard{G191} therefore{G3767} that{G3754} he was sick{G770}, he abode{G3306} two{G1417} days{G2250} still{G3306} in{G1722} the same{G3739} place where{G5117} he was{G2258}.
Then{G1899} after{G3326} that{G5124} saith he{G3004} to{G3588} his disciples{G3101}, Let us go{G71} into{G1519} Jud√¶a{G3588} again{G3825}.
His disciples{G3588} say{G3004} unto him{G846}, Master{G4461}, the Jews{G2453} of late{G3568} sought{G2212} to stone{G3034} thee{G4571}; and{G2532} goest thou{G5217} thither{G1563} again{G3825}?

Jesus{G3588} answered{G611}, Are there{G1526} not{G3780} twelve{G1427} hours{G5610} in the day{G3588}? If{G1437} any man{G5100} walk{G4043} in{G1722} the day{G3588}, he stumbleth{G4350} not{G3756}, because{G3754} he seeth{G991} the light{G3588} of{G3588} this{G5127} world{G2889}.
But{G1161} if{G1437} a man{G5100} walk{G4043} in{G1722} the night{G3588}, he stumbleth{G4350}, because{G3754} there is{G2076} no{G3756} light{G3588} in{G1722} him{G846}.

These things{G5023} said he{G2036}: and{G2532} after{G3326} that{G5124} he saith{G3004} unto them{G846}, Our{G2257} friend{G5384} Lazarus{G2976} sleepeth{G2837}; but{G235} I go{G4198}, that{G2443} I may awake{G1852} him{G846} out of sleep{G1852}.
Then{G3767} said{G2036} his{G846} disciples{G3588}, Lord{G2962}, if{G1487} he sleep{G2837}, he shall do well{G4982}.
Howbeit{G1161} Jesus{G3588} spake{G2046} of{G4012} his{G846} death{G3588}: but{G1161} they{G1565} thought{G1380} that{G3754} he had spoken{G3004} of{G4012} taking of rest{G3588} in sleep{G3588}.
Then{G5119} said{G2036} Jesus{G3588} unto them{G846} plainly{G3954}, Lazarus{G2976} is dead{G599}.

And{G2532} I am glad{G5463} for{G1223} your sakes{G5209} that{G2443} I was{G2252} not{G3756} there{G1563}, to the intent{G3754} ye may believe{G4100}; nevertheless{G235} let us go{G71} unto{G4314} him{G846}.

Then{G3767} said{G2036} Thomas{G2381}, which is called{G3004} Didymus{G1324}, unto his fellowdisciples{G3588}, Let{G71} us{G2249} also{G2532} go{G71}, that{G2443} we may die{G599} with{G3326} him{G846}.
Then when{G3767} Jesus{G3588} came{G2064}, he{G846} found that{G2147} he had{G2192} lain in{G1722}the grave{G3588} four{G5064} days{G2250} already{G2235}.
Now{G1161} Bethany{G3588} was{G2258} nigh unto{G1451} Jerusalem{G3588}, about{G5613} fifteen{G1178} furlongs{G4712} off{G575}:
And{G2532} many{G4183} of{G1537} the Jews{G2453} came{G2064} to{G4012} Martha{G3136} and{G2532} Mary{G3137}, to{G2443} comfort{G3888} them{G846} concerning{G4012} their{G846} brother{G3588}.

Then{G3767} Martha{G3136}, as soon as{G5613} she heard{G191} that{G3754} Jesus{G3588} was coming{G2064}, went and met{G5221} him{G846}: but{G1161} Mary{G3137} sat{G2516} still in{G1722} the house{G3588}.
Then{G3767} said{G2036} Martha{G3588} unto{G4314} Jesus{G3588}, Lord{G2962}, if{G1487} thou hadst been{G2258} here{G5602}, my{G3450} brother{G3588} had{G2348} not{G3756} died{G2348}.
But{G235} I know{G1492}, that{G3754} even now{G3568}, whatsoever{G3745} thou wilt ask{G154} of God{G3588}, God{G3588} will give{G1325} it thee{G4671}.
Jesus{G3588} saith{G3004} unto her{G846}, Thy{G4675} brother{G3588} shall rise again{G450}.
Martha{G3136} saith{G3004} unto him{G846}, I know{G1492} that{G3754} he shall rise again{G450} in{G1722} the resurrection{G3588} at{G1722} the last{G2078} day{G2250}.

Jesus{G3588} said{G2036} unto her{G846}, I{G1473} am{G1510} the resurrection{G3588}, and{G2532} the life{G3588}: he that believeth{G4100} in{G1519} me{G1691}, though{G2579} he were dead{G599}, yet{G2579} shall he live{G2198}:
And{G2532} whosoever{G3956} liveth{G2198} and{G2532} believeth{G4100} in{G1519} me{G1691} shall{G599} never{G3756} die{G599}. Believest thou{G4100} this{G5124}?

She saith{G3004} unto him{G846}, Yea{G3483}, Lord{G2962}: I{G1473} believe{G4100} that{G3754} thou{G4771} art{G1488} the Christ{G3588}, the Son{G3588} of God{G3588}, which should come{G2064} into{G1519} the world{G3588}.

And{G2532} when she had{G2036} so{G5023} said{G2036}, she went her way{G565}, and{G2532} called{G5455} Mary{G3137} her{G846} sister{G3588} secretly{G2977}, saying{G2036}, The Master{G3588} is come{G3918}, and{G2532} calleth{G5455} for thee{G4571}.
As soon as{G5613} she{G1565} heard{G191} that, she arose{G1453} quickly{G5035}, and{G2532} came{G2064} unto{G4314} him{G846}.
Now{G1161} Jesus{G3588} was{G2064} not yet{G3768} come{G2064} into{G1519} the town{G3588}, but{G235} was{G2258} in{G1722} that place{G3588} where{G3699} Martha{G3588} met{G5221} him{G846}.

The Jews{G2453} then{G3767} which were{G5607} with{G3326} her{G846} in{G1722} the house{G3588}, and{G2532} comforted{G3888} her{G846}, when they saw{G1492} Mary{G3588}, that{G3754} she rose up{G450} hastily{G5030} and{G2532} went out{G1831}, followed{G190} her{G846}, saying{G3004}, She goeth{G5217}unto{G1519} the grave{G3588} to{G2443} weep{G2799} there{G1563}.

Then{G3767} when{G5613} Mary{G3137} was come{G2064} where{G3699} Jesus{G3588} was{G2258}, and saw{G1492} him{G846}, she fell down{G4098} at{G1519} his{G846} feet{G3588}, saying{G3004} unto him{G846}, Lord{G2962}, if{G1487} thou hadst been{G2258} here{G5602}, my{G3450} brother{G3588} had{G599} not{G3756} died{G599}.

When{G5613} Jesus{G2424} therefore{G3767} saw{G1492} her{G846} weeping{G2799}, and{G2532} the Jews{G2453} also{G4905} weeping{G2799} which came{G4905} with her{G846}, he{G1438} groaned{G1690} in the spirit{G3588}, and{G2532} was troubled{G5015},
And{G2532} said{G2036}, Where{G4226} have ye laid{G5087} him{G846}? They said{G3004} unto him{G846}, Lord{G2962}, come{G2064} and{G2532} see{G1492}.
Jesus{G3588} wept{G1145}.
Then{G3767} said{G3004} the Jews{G2453}, Behold{G1492} how{G4459} he loved{G5368} him{G846}!

And{G1161} some{G5100} of{G1537} them{G846} said{G2036}, Could{G1410} not{G3756} this man{G3778}, which opened{G455} the eyes{G3588} of the blind{G5185}, have caused{G4160} that{G2443} even{G2532} this man{G3778} should{G599} not{G3361} have died{G599}?

Jesus{G2424} therefore{G3767} again{G3825} groaning{G1690} in{G1722} himself{G1438} cometh{G2064} to{G1519} the grave{G3588}. It was{G2258} a cave{G4693}, and{G2532} a stone{G3037} lay{G1945} upon{G1909} it{G846}.

Jesus{G3588} said{G3004}, Take ye away{G142} the stone{G3588}. Martha{G3136}, the sister{G3588} of him that was dead{G2348}, saith{G3004} unto him{G846}, Lord{G2962}, by this time{G2235} he stinketh{G3605}: for{G1063} he hath been{G2076} dead four days{G5066}.
Jesus{G3588} saith{G3004} unto her{G846}, Said I{G2036} not{G3756} unto thee{G4671}, that{G3754}, if{G1437} thou wouldest believe{G4100}, thou shouldest see{G3700} the glory{G3588} of God{G3588}?

Then{G3767} they took away{G142} the stone{G3588} from the place where{G3757} the dead{G2348} was{G2258} laid{G2749}. And{G1161} Jesus{G2424} lifted{G142} up{G507} his eyes{G3588}, and{G2532} said{G2036}, Father{G3962}, I thank{G2168} thee{G4671} that{G3754} thou hast heard{G191} me{G3450}.

And{G1161} I{G1473} knew{G1492} that{G3754} thou hearest{G191} me{G3450} always{G3842}: but{G235} because of{G1223} the people{G3588} which stand by{G4026} I said{G2036} it, that{G2443} they may believe{G4100} that{G3754} thou{G4771} hast sent{G649} me{G3165}.
And{G2532} when he{G2036} thus{G5023} had spoken{G2036}, he cried{G2905} with a{G5456} loud{G3173} voice{G5456}, Lazarus{G2976}, come{G1204} forth{G1854}.

And{G2532} he that was dead{G2348} came forth{G1831}, bound{G1210} hand{G3588} and{G2532} foot{G3588} with{G1210} graveclothes{G2750}: and{G2532} his{G846} face{G3588} was bound about with{G4019} a napkin{G4676}. Jesus{G3588} saith{G3004} unto them{G846}, Loose{G3089} him{G846}, and{G2532} let him{G863} go{G5217}.

Then{G3767} many{G4183} of{G1537} the Jews{G2453} which came{G2064} to{G4314} Mary{G3588}, and{G2532} had seen{G2300} the things which{G3739} Jesus{G3588} did{G4160}, believed{G4100} on{G1519} him{G846}.
But{G1161} some{G5100} of{G1537} them{G846} went their ways{G565} to{G4314} the Pharisees{G3588}, and{G2532} told{G2036} them{G846} what things{G3739} Jesus{G3588} had done{G4160}.

Then{G3767} gathered{G4863} the chief priests{G3588} and{G2532} the Pharisees{G3588} a council{G4892}, and{G2532} said{G3004}, What{G5101} do we{G4160}? for{G3754} this{G3778} man{G3588} doeth{G4160} many{G4183} miracles{G4592}.

If{G1437} we let{G863} him{G846} thus alone{G3779}, all{G3956} men will believe{G4100} on{G1519} him{G846}: and{G2532} the Romans{G4514} shall come{G2064} and{G2532} take away{G142} both{G2532} our{G2257} place{G3588} and{G2532} nation{G3588}.

And{G1161} one{G1520} of{G1537} them{G846}, named Caiaphas{G2533}, being{G5607} the high priest{G749} that same{G1565} year{G3588}, said{G2036} unto them{G846}, Ye{G5210} know{G1492} nothing{G3756} at all{G3762},

Nor{G3761} consider{G1260} that{G3754} it is expedient{G4851} for us{G2254}, that{G2443} one{G1520} man{G444} should die{G599} for{G5228} the people{G3588}, and{G2532} that{G2443} the whole{G3650} nation{G3588} perish{G622} not{G3361}.

And{G1161} this{G5124} spake he{G2036} not{G3756} of{G575} himself{G1438}: but{G235} being{G5607} high priest{G749} that{G1565} year{G3588}, he prophesied{G4395} that{G3754} Jesus{G3588} should{G3195} die{G599} for{G5228} that nation{G3588};

And{G2532} not{G3756} for{G5228} that nation{G3588} only{G3440}, but{G235} that{G2443} also{G2532} he should gather together{G4863} in{G1519} one{G1520} the children{G3588} of God{G3588} that were scattered abroad{G1287}.
Then{G3767} from{G575} that{G1565} day{G3588} forth{G575} they took counsel together{G4823} for{G2443} to put{G615} him{G846} to death{G615}.

Jesus{G2424} therefore{G3767} walked{G4043} no{G3756} more{G2089} openly{G3954} among{G1722} the Jews{G2453}; but{G235} went{G565} thence{G1564} unto{G1519} a country{G3588} near to{G1451} the wilderness{G2048}, into{G1519} a city{G4172} called{G3004} Ephraim{G2187}, and there{G2546} continued{G1304} with{G3326} his{G846} disciples{G3588}.

And{G1161} the Jews'{G2453} passover{G3957} was{G2258} nigh at hand{G1451}: and{G2532} many{G4183} went{G305} out of{G1537} the country{G3588} up to{G1519} Jerusalem{G2414} before{G4253} the passover{G3957}, to{G2443} purify{G48} themselves{G1438}.

Then{G3767} sought they{G2212} for Jesus{G3588}, and{G2532} spake{G3004} among{G3326} themselves{G240}, as they stood{G2476} in{G1722}the temple{G3588}, What{G5101} think{G1380} ye{G5213}, that{G3754} he will{G2064} not{G3756} come{G2064} to{G1519} the feast{G3588}?

Now{G1161} both{G2532} the chief priests{G3588} and{G2532} the Pharisees{G3588} had given{G1325} a commandment{G1785}, that{G2443}, if{G1437} any man{G5100} knew{G1097} where{G4226} he were{G2076}, he should shew{G3377} it, that{G3704} they might take{G4084} him{G846}.
